Package com.gsm.model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.model.AuditableEntity
      • com.gsm.model.Product
  • @Entity
public class Product
extends AuditableEntity
    Represents the core Product entity in the system.

    A Product is a general template for a sellable item (e.g., "Polo Shirt") and acts as a parent for multiple ProductVariants, which define specific attributes like color and size.

    • Field Detail

      • productId

        private java.lang.Long productId
        The unique identifier for the Product.

      • productCode

        private java.lang.String productCode
        The unique business code for the product, used for identification and integration. E.g., "P-001".

      • productName

        private java.lang.String productName
        The descriptive name of the product. E.g., "Men's Cotton Polo Shirt".

      • productCategory

        private ProductCategory productCategory
        The category this product belongs to. FetchType.LAZY is used for performance optimization, preventing the category from being loaded from the database until it's explicitly accessed.

      • unit

        private Unit unit
        The standard unit of measure for this product (e.g., "Pcs", "Set"). FetchType.LAZY improves performance by delaying the loading of this entity.

      • season

        private java.lang.String season
        The season or collection this product is associated with. E.g., "Spring/Summer 2025".

      • status

        private ProductStatus status
        The current lifecycle status of the product. Stored as a String in the database for readability and to prevent issues if the enum order changes in the future.

      • variants

        private java.util.List<ProductVariant> variants
        A list of all specific variants (e.g., by color/size) for this product. - CascadeType.ALL: Operations (save, update, delete) on a Product will cascade to its variants. - orphanRemoval=true: If a variant is removed from this list, it will be deleted from the database.
